definition: to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: SPECT imaging will demonstrate decreased radiotracer uptake in the frontal and temporal lobes.
sentences.chinese: SPECT成像顯示額顳葉放射性攝取減低。

sentences.english: This radioactive form of nitrogen does not occur in nature.
sentences.chinese: 氮的這種放射性形式在自然界中不會產生。

sentences.english: The death rate of the cancer of breast, lung, bone and leukemias in Xinjiang resident are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 放射性所致居民受照劑量和居民的惡性腫瘤死亡率等。

sentences.english: Objective To examine the pulmonary tuberculosis mortality risk of the residents in high background radiation area (HBRA), Yangjiang, China.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討天然放射性高本底地區居民肺結核死亡危險。

sentences.english: Chronic phase appearance of radiation hepatitis is similar to that of hepatocirrhosis.
sentences.chinese: 慢性期放射性肝損傷類似肝硬化之表現。

sentences.english: Debao Ceramics has passed the certification from national Environmental ProtectionDepartment, which is considered as no radioactivity and anti-bacterium.
sentences.chinese: 德寶衛浴已通過國家環保局的無放射性及抗菌性認證。

sentences.english: The pills flood the thyroid gland with non-radioactive iodine.
sentences.chinese: 這種藥片可以使甲狀腺充滿非放射性碘。

sentences.english: Radioactive iodine has a half-life of eight days and decays naturally within weeks.
sentences.chinese: 放射性碘的半衰期爲八天，幾周內自然衰變。

sentences.english: "Radioactive iodine will be gone in a month," Hoffman said.
sentences.chinese: “放射性的碘一個月後消失，”胡夫曼說。

sentences.english: The worst-case accident would be enormous releases of radioactivity.
sentences.chinese: 最糟糕的情況要數放射性物質的大量泄漏。

sentences.english: Applies virulent or when the radiochemistry goods pays attention protects oneself .
sentences.chinese: 應用有毒或放射性化學物品時注意保護自己。

sentences.english: So why does coal waste appear so radioactive?
sentences.chinese: 那麼爲什麼煤電廢物看上去很具放射性呢？

sentences.english: Bring radioactive, people naturally think of Curies.
sentences.chinese: 提起放射性，人們自然想到居里夫婦。

sentences.english: The presence of radioactivity in some vegetables and milk has been confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 已經確認在一些蔬菜和牛奶中發現放射性物質。

sentences.english: The unhealthful radioactivity in environment has increasingly been an interest problem.
sentences.chinese: 環境中放射性對健康的影響日益成爲人們關心的問題。

sentences.english: Radioactivity was measured in-situ over 392 rock and soil samples.
sentences.chinese: 現場測定岩土放射性樣品392組。
